PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-12662019-08-21,  ,  ,  FIN, 
ActSpecial Import Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Import Measures Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL IMPORT MEASURES REGULATIONS in order to provide a method for the Canada Border Services Agency to determine an appropriate amount for the cost of production in the two instances : (1) Transactions between associated parties; and (2) Particular market situation.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0314 Publication Date: 2019-09-04
AttachmentsAttachment
